extendedInfo.description: Life is often encountered in such a situation, such as: clothes that are beautiful, but do not know wear that? Unnecessary appointments or else go? And so on - this time to suggest to you if no one, how would you choose, when you do not know how to do the time, do not prevent the software under test, it can help you quickly make a decision. Function as the version supports two modes of operation: 1 second election only YES or NO 2 of the three approaches both Paper-Scissor-RockVery simple to use, as long as your heart will choose to do one of the options with the binding (for example: to date = yes, go = no), and turn the wheel, after a random period of time to run, select the arrow refers to the option can be used as your reference. Note: The software is purely entertainment and important life choices that only you can decide.
